features.featureTitle: Update the single-page UI layout so that when the Audio section is shown (currently only for Veda = Samaveda and Mantra Number = 47), it renders directly below the Mantra Text section (i.e., after the mantra text content card) and before the Meaning section, instead of rendering below the Meaning card.
